title: Blatently Cheating

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Once a day, ask the host a yes or no question. The host must answer the question in day chat, but provide no explanation beyond the yes or no they give out.
- During the night, ask the host to do a favor.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-  Your favors are limited to information gathering, slight targeting manipulation, or outright ignoring a player during processing.
- The host may choose to ignore your favor, if they do, you are entitled to some form of compensation by the host.
- For all intents and purposes, this role was created 23 hours and 58 minutes after the post for the role **Role Challange** (4100)

desc:
Post 4105
*I rolled a 6, so im moving 7 spaces real quick*
